channel.title: Added, how do I work it?
channel.description:
Hey, i have added the special attack bar for dragon claws but i do not know how i would add the actual add the attack, i know what emote it is and how much of the bar it takes.
Thanks

item.title: Added, how do I work it?
item.dc:creator: @Zezerex Zezerex
item.description:
@Zezerex wrote:

[quote=“xxDiluted2xx, post:5, topic:286250”]There is a tutorial on it, called ‘How to add specials to any weapon’ In the tutorials setion, can’t miss it. Hope it gives you what your looking for.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: June 30, 2009, 06:55:57 am[/size][hr][quote author=Owner Nader link=topic=378587.msg2847511#msg2847511 date=1246366102]

[quote author=Zezerex link=topic=378587.msg2847510#msg2847510 date=1246366012]

Look For [size=10pt]TUTORIALS[/size] And Use [size=10pt]SEARCH BUTTON[/size]
[/quote]please only give real suggestions
[/quote]This is a real suggestion,

Your so enequate. Gtfo, he asked for help, not common sence.[/quote]already looked at it about 10 times, it doesnt work for me

Read full topic
